item.title: worldtimebuddy
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: worldtimebuddy – handy little site for tracking the date and time across multiple time zones. Especially when your team of five people spans a range of 18 hours across time zones on three different continents. Only downside is the mobile experience, there doesn’t seem to be any way to change the time setting when I […]
item.content:encoded:
worldtimebuddy – handy little site for tracking the date and time across multiple time zones. Especially when your team of five people spans a range of 18 hours across time zones on three different continents.

Only downside is the mobile experience, there doesn’t seem to be any way to change the time setting when I viewed the site with an iPhone.
